text: Otopeni Airport (full name: Henri Coandă International Airport; ) is the airport with the most traffic in Romania, and it is based in Otopeni, a city which is 16.5 km (10.3 mi) from the center of Bucharest. In 2018, the airport had 13,824,830 total passengers. == References == == Other websites == * * Official website * Google Map – Aerial View * Category:Airports in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Bucharest
title: Otopeni Airport
